title: Understanding Gaussian Distribution
text: A Gaussian distribution, also known as a normal distribution, is a common continuous probability distribution. It is important to recognize its shape as it is frequently encountered in data analysis.

title: Characteristics of Gaussian Distribution
text: The Gaussian distribution is symmetric around its mean. This symmetry is a key feature that helps in identifying its shape.

title: Visualizing the Distribution
text: Imagine plotting the frequency of data points on a graph. The Gaussian distribution will form a specific shape that is often described in a particular way.

title: Identifying the Shape
text: What is the common term used to describe the shape of a Gaussian distribution?
